abstract: Discover cardholders can now pay directly for purchases on Amazon.com using cash back bonus points.
snippet: Discover cardholders can now pay directly for purchases on Amazon.com using cash back bonus points.
lead_paragraph: 5:15 p.m. | Updated To note that Discover cardholders automatically earn as much as 1 percent cash back because some cardholders earn less than 1 percent.

headline.main: Discover Cardholders Can Pay With Points at Amazon
